Articles.Content:
Awesome. How about adding the Fregat SB, and some more fairings now? Also, I'd really like to see you model the Energia. Come to think of it, for the basic version, you'd need to make one engine (RD-0120), one fuel tank and a "booster conversion kit" of sorts, containing parachutes and retrorockets (I can look them up for you if you want). Energia-M would be just another fuel tank and a fairing set (and perhaps a simple nosecone instead of the big booster kit). You mentioned Vostok, but Energia could probably be done somewhat quicker, and also has an advantage of not requiring an IVA.

Regardless, if you're looking for a testing/research guy, I can help you out.

OP has been updated with the download link. Please let me know if you guys have issues! Enjoy!

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1482056/horizon64.jpg

Downloading. Feedback soon. Looks epic.

Very nice... only a tiny problem with the included craft file, the struts you used are not the stock ones, but a global search and replace of strutConnectorHeavy with strutConnector fixed that in a couple of seconds. Flies well, looks beautiful.

Stubbles...my man...really you are a wizard!!!

Its so realistic,the movement of engines,the movement at the manouver of RD 120....the sound,the flames!!!!

I do launches again and again...

Edited March 4, 2014 by CERVERUS

Can't wait to see all the amazing changes that we've come up with as a collective group for the final release! Too bad I have school in about 30 minutes

Oh well! This is a great pack and I hope you all enjoy

Simply amazing mod man: 9.9/10. Close to perfection even in the launch version.

It's only me getting over separated flames at higher trusth? Anyway it's not a problem at all, and I know how tricky is the particle system.

Congrats, truly fantastic job. Do one or two cool legs, a small engine and medium tanks... and ends with the KW reign.

EDIT: I give you 5 stars, I can' give you more rep yet.

Edited March 4, 2014 by Proot

Congrats, truly fantastic job. Do one or two cool legs, a small engine and medium tanks... and ends with the KW reign.

EDIT: I give you 5 stars, I can' give you more rep yet.

I love the KW...but i agree to there is an alternative version from HORIZON !!!

I love the KW...but i agree to there is an alternative version from HORIZON !!!

I like KW too! (just joking)

But now I'm in love with Horizon.
The models and textures you have made here are of aaa quality. I really hope i can get to this level of skill in my own modelling someday.
Alright, the release version is glorious. It really feels like a real rocket, only downside is the lack of carreer mode integration, but other than that, fantastic job.
I'm finding it hard to download, it just downloads as a document?

I'm finding it hard to download, it just downloads as a document?

The original upload is a .7z archive, I guess your machine doesn't have a suitable decompressor program installed so it doesn't recognise the file type.

For the benefit of you and any others with the same problem I've just mirrored it as a regular zip file at this dropbox location

edit: I've added another copy which includes the KW strut used in the craft file here in case it helps anyone without KW.

Edited March 4, 2014 by Roxette
added copy with missing strut
Great job stubbles this really looks nice and flights good too.

I like KW too! (just joking)

But now I'm in love with Horizon.

Yes i understand your joke...but i think its good idea about add and another parts to his mod
Only downloads as a document?

Only downloads as a document?

You not see post http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/16866-Horizon-Aeronautics-Development-Thread?p=1002961&viewfull=1#post1002961

Edit and 7zip is free.

Edited March 4, 2014 by Mecripp2

Thanks for the feedback everyone, I'm glad you're enjoying it! There will be tweaks/updates in the coming days I'm sure.

I'll see about getting up another link that has the archive in plain .zip format, for those that don't have 7zip (which you should, it's rad ).
These engines look really great in-game, nice work.

Just woke of from being asleep on the sofa and this was the first thing that popped into my head!

Download awaayyyyy!

(will report back later with info)

but with 87 mods...

What the? hahaha. That is insane.

What the? hahaha. That is insane.

(sorry if I'm bugging you with my endless comments, I can tell it's annoying)

Just NO, I'm sorry, I won't try to be funny ever again
Congrats on your first release of the mod! I hope everyone enjoys playing with it as I do!

Finally it loaded!

Everything is working well (and looking amazing!) apart from the fact that for some reason the Zenit craft says it has locked or invalid parts, although I have every single one unlocked
